long_description: The ultralight SRAM X0 10-speed rear derailleur delivers fast, precise shifts in a tough design so you can focus on the trails and not your derailleur. Exact Actuation means precise, even gear changes throughout the shifting range-when you move a shifter, the derailleur moves the same amount for 1:1 action. Direct routing design minimizes cable friction for light-effort shifting performance. Constructed out of forged aluminum with carbon fiber outer cage for light, stiff and sturdy performance. Replaceable pulleys have sealed cartridge bearings for low-drag, long-lasting spinning. Capable of handling up to a 36-tooth cassette cog. The SRAM X0 10-speed rear derailleur is compatible with all SRAM 10-speed shifters; available with long cage length.
short_description: The ultralight SRAM X0 10-speed rear derailleur delivers fast, precise shifts in a tough design so you can focus on the trails and not your derailleur.
